overview:
## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the view controller currently allows editing; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If the view is editable and the associated navigation controller contains an edit-done button, then a Done button is displayed; otherwise, an Edit button is displayed. Clicking either button toggles the state of this property. Add an edit-done button by setting the custom left or right view of the navigation item to the value returned by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/editButtonItem] method. Use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/setEditing(_:animated:)] method as an action method to animate the transition of this state if the view is already displayed.

# isEditing

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the view controller currently allows the user to edit the view contents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEditing: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the view controller currently allows editing; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If the view is editable and the associated navigation controller contains an edit-done button, then a Done button is displayed; otherwise, an Edit button is displayed. Clicking either button toggles the state of this property. Add an edit-done button by setting the custom left or right view of the navigation item to the value returned by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/editButtonItem] method. Set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/isEditing] property to the initial state of your view. Use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/setEditing(_:animated:)] method as an action method to animate the transition of this state if the view is already displayed.

## Adding editing behaviors to your view controller

- **setEditing(_:animated:)**: Sets whether the view controller shows an editable view.
- **editButtonItem**: Returns a bar button item that toggles its title and associated state between Edit and Done.
